The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with radiation with mathematical formulas recorded on their body. Leaving the love and companionship group of miners are left confused with what to do.
Love really plays a part in this film as a love triangle develops, there is conflict and to be honest it was annoying to watch love romance take place
